name: Mariusz Jan Skobel
profile_summary:
Results-driven Senior Quality Engineer with over 10 years of experience in ensuring software quality through advanced methodologies in distributed systems and performance tuning. Proficient in implementing and managing tools such as **Kubernetes**, **EKS**, **Chaos Engineering**, **Chaos Mesh**, **Litmus**, **AWS Fault Injection Simulator**, and **Karpenter** to enhance system reliability and resilience. Skilled in monitoring and observability using **HoneyComb**, **CloudWatch**, and **Prometheus** to ensure optimal performance and timely issue resolution.

Originally a Full Stack Developer, I bring a robust technical background in modern technologies including **JavaScript/TypeScript**, **Python**, and **Flutter**, with comprehensive experience in frameworks like **React**, **Next.js**, **Vue**, **Node.js**, **FastAPI**, and **Django**. Adept at building cloud-native applications on **AWS** and **Azure**, I have contributed to the development of enterprise platforms utilizing AI/ML for enhanced operational efficiency and intelligent decision-making. My expertise also extends to microservices architecture, event-driven systems, and CI/CD automation, ensuring solutions are secure, maintainable, and compliant with industry standards such as HIPAA, FHIR, PCI DSS, and SOC 2. Passionate about enhancing software stability and user experience, I am committed to delivering high-impact solutions.
